backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a gamified progression system with player profiles, stats, missions, skills, daily tasks, custom tasks, combat mechanics, and questionnaire-based personalization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: username editing interface and account deletion functionality in ProfileSettingsPage with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the CRYONEX gamified progression tracking application.
frontend/index.css: Empty global CSS file (content appears to be in frontend/src/index.css instead).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for CRYONEX application with Inter font preload, viewport meta tags, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, profile setup, personalization questionnaire, and navigation between dashboard, missions, custom tasks, stats, skills, and profile screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyT: Dashboard card component displaying AI-generated daily tasks with completion tracking, XP/coin rewards display, and active/completed task separation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DateCa: Calendar widget displaying current date from device in MM/DD/YY format with accent-colored styling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/RealTi: Clock widget displaying real-time HH:MM:SS from device with primary-colored styling and monospace font.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, sidebar navigation (dashboard, missions, custom tasks, stats, skills, profile), scrollable content area, and footer with semi-transparent dark backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/profile/AccountD: A confirmation dialog component that warns users about permanent account deletion and lists all data that will be removed (profile, missions, skills, stats, tasks, coins, XP, inventory).
frontend/src/components/profile/Personal: A multi-step questionnaire dialog that collects user preferences across 5 questions (playstyle, mission types, stat priority, skill category, game goals) with progress tracking and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: An initial profile setup dialog that prompts new users to enter a nickname (max 30 characters) to initialize their CRYONEX profile.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CustomTask: A form component for creating custom tasks with configurable title, XP points (1-100), and attribute points (1-10) using increment/decrement controls.
Displays user's custom tasks separated into active and completed sections, showing task details (title, XP, attribute points) with toggle completion functionality.
frontend/src/content/copy.ts: Centralized copy/text content for the entire application including UI labels, messages, and questionnaire questions organized by feature area (auth, profile, missions, stats, etc.).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceDate.ts: React hook that returns the current date in DD/MM/YY format and updates automatically at midnight each day.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, providing login/logout functionality, identity management, and authentication status tracking using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for all backend API calls including user profile management, questionnaire answers, daily tasks, custom tasks, missions, and skills with optimistic updates and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useRealTimeClock.ts: React hook that returns the current time in HH:MM:SS format (24-hour) and updates every second.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom sci-fi themed color variables for light/dark modes featuring cyan/green accents, plus global styles with background image and semi-transparent overlay utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CustomTasksPage.tsx: Page component displaying a form to create custom tasks and a list of existing custom tasks with semi-transparent card styling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page showing user stats (level, XP, coins, streak), real-time clock/calendar, and daily tasks section with progress tracking and sci-fi themed cards.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, login button, and four feature cards highlighting gamification, progression, daily tasks, and blockchain security with sci-fi styling.
frontend/src/pages/MissionsPage.tsx: Displays daily and repeatable missions with completion status, XP/gold rewards, and level requirements; allows users to complete missions if eligible based on level and cooldown timers.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Provides user profile management including username editing, account deletion with confirmation dialog, and logout functionality; displays user stats like level, XP, gold, and energy.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Displays skills organized by category (physical, mental, social, creative, financial, health, learning, personal) with unlock functionality based on level and skill point requirements.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Allows users to allocate unspent stat points across multiple attributes with increment/decrement controls, showing current values, pending allocations, and remaining points before submission.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations, and typography/container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking username editing and account deletion features for a user profile page. Contains existing frontend features (edit interface, delete button with confirmation) and pending backend requirements (update username function, delete account function).
